QuestData.Title: A Nation Divided
QuestData.Description:
Kul Tiras must be unified before it can be of any help to the Alliance.
Let's get you briefed on the current situation in each of our major territories.
Then you can take a look at the map behind me and make the call on where you want to go first.
QuestData.LogDescription: Inspect the Scouting Map in the Harbormaster's Office.
QuestData.RewardText: We'll support you however we can.
